tasks.label: Build and Run Full Stack
args: Write-Host 'Starting Order Management System...'; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'cd "${workspaceFolder}\order-service"; Write-Host "Starting Spring Boot Backend..."; mvn spring-boot:run' -WindowStyle Normal; Start-Sleep 3; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'cd "${workspaceFolder}\order-ui"; Write-Host "Installing dependencies..."; npm install; Write-Host "Starting React Frontend..."; npm start' -WindowStyle Normal
